TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TransactionFlowBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension

Docs.summary: Represents the configuration element that specifies transaction flow support for a binding. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This element allows you to enable or disable incoming transaction flow in an endpointâ€™s binding settings, as well as to specify the desired protocol format for incoming transactions.
> [!CAUTION] > When using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol.OleTransactions%2A> protocol to flow transactions from endpoint to endpoint, the transaction timeout can be lost if the destination endpoint attempts to flow again using any protocol other than <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol.OleTransactions%2A>. This can cause all down-level nodes after the <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol.OleTransactions%2A> hop to timeout later than expected.

public override System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement Clone ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement Clone() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a duplicate of this element.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement> that is a duplicate of this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method creates a deep clone of this binding element. A deep clone of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object. (This is also called copying the entire object graph.) A shallow clone of an object, by contrast, is a copy of the object only. If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects; instead, it copies only the references to the original objects.

Docs.value: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement> that is a duplicate of this element.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol TransactionProtocol { get; set; }
.property instance class System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol TransactionProtocol

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the transaction protocol used in flowing a transaction.
Docs.value: A that specifies the transaction protocol to be used for transaction flow. The default is <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol.OleTransactions%2A>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[crabout](../../add/includes/crabout-md.md)] choosing the protocol to be used, see [Enabling Transaction Flow](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/31a6bc6a-4ef4-45ba-a753-1efa1a19d917).

Docs.returns: A that specifies the transaction protocol to be used for transaction flow. The default is <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol.OleTransactions%2A>.
